About Me.

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands.

I am a self-taught Front-end Web Developer, I have completed a number of bootcamps that have trained me in using a number of technologies. Through these bootcamps I have learnt how to create responsive and visually appealling websites that people will love to visit and spend time browsing on. I am capable of creating websites using HTML, Css and Javascript these technologies are capable of producing some beautiful websites. I am presently training myself on using The React framework to enable the creation of more complex websites quickly and efficiently.

Web Developer Bootcamp.

Course from Udemy led by Colt Steele. A fantastic, thorough understanding of Web Development utilising projects to practice what you have learnt alongside video tutorials.

The HTML and CSS Workshop.

Course From Packt Publishing. The course was Great focusing on a variety of aspects of web development and used website creation to teach you about website creation and how to create great looking web pages.

The JavaScript Workshop.

course from Packt Publishing. The course focused on JavaScript and went through all of the Fundamentals to the creation of varying projects using the language.
